message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its true value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $13,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your position, Alice. I'll try to stay within my budget while still valuing the product. Could we agree on $13,200?
